Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface TurnSequenceModifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddBuildBeforeMoveIfNotMoveUpPower, AddBuildNotEdgePower, AddBuildNotSameBoxPower, AddBuildOnSameBoxPower, AddMoveNotStartingBoxPower, AddThreeBuildsToUnmovedWorkerIfOnGroundPower, BuildDomeEverywherePower, BuildModifier, BuildUnderYourselfPower, DoNothing, MoveModifier, OpponentsCantMoveUpIfPlayerMovesUpPower, PushAdjacentOpponentPower, RemoveAdjacentBlockPower, SwapPower
public interface TurnSequenceModifier

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changePossibleOptions​(Player player, ActionController actionController, Map map)
    This method adds or removes boxes from choosable list based on the god power

  • Method Details

    • changePossibleOptions

      void changePossibleOptions​(Player player, ActionController actionController, Map map)
      This method adds or removes boxes from choosable list based on the god power
      Parameters:
      player - Player that has the card
      actionController - Action controller
      map - Map of the match

    • executeAction

      void executeAction​(Player player, CommunicationController communicationController, ActionController actionController, Map map, java.util.List<Player> opponents, java.util.List<WinCondition> winConditions, MatchStory matchStory) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method executes actions before using the power
      Parameters:
      player - Player that has the card
      communicationController - Communication controller
      actionController - Action controller
      map - Map of the match
      opponents - Player's opponents
      winConditions - List of win conditions
      matchStory - Last turn story
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out
      ChannelClosedException - Exception thrown when communication channel is closed

    • usePower

      void usePower​(Player player, CommunicationController communicationController, ActionController actionController, Map map, java.util.List<Player> opponents, java.util.List<WinCondition> winConditions, boolean usePower, MatchStory matchStory) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method calls executePower if player chooses to use the power
      Parameters:
      player - Player that has the card
      communicationController - Communication controller
      actionController - Action controller
      map - Map of the match
      opponents - Player's opponents
      winConditions - List of win conditions
      usePower - Boolean that is true if player chose to use the power
      matchStory - Last turn story
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out
      ChannelClosedException - Exception thrown when communication channel is closed

    • executePower

      void executePower​(Player player, ActionController actionController, Box chosenBox, MatchStory matchStory)
      This method executes the power
      Parameters:
      player - Player that has the card
      actionController - Action controller
      chosenBox - Chosen box
      matchStory - Last turn story
